title.rendered: Grocery Delivery Mobile App Development Costing, Planning & Development Source

content.rendered:
Studies have proved that the number of users of grocery delivery apps is increasing at a higher rate.

Compared to the past data, there is a massive increase in the number of on-demand grocery mobile app users.

As per a recent study, more than 35 percent of the user community across the world prefer to order their daily groceries online.

Owing to such growing figures, high-quality Grocery Delivery App Development has witnessed an impressing momentum, and on the other hand, it is smoothly paving the way for offering an enthralling and exemplified experience to the users. 

By offering a user-friendly and well-designed grocery app, you can help your customers to avoid standing in long queues.

Different grocery delivery app businesses, for example, Amazon Fresh, Instacart, and more have already earned billions of dollars in this industry.

Today, there are many app development companies that can develop a perfect grocery store app for businesses.

Then craft unique, user-friendly, and fast apps that come with some advanced features. 

If you are planning to enter this industry, then keep reading this article to learn everything about Grocery Delivery App Development, its cost, and more.

Some Important Market Stats and Growth Facts to Know:

  • As per a report submitted by the IBIS, this industry crossed the USD757 billion mark in 2021 with a growth rate of 2.1 percent.
  • As per some market experts, the grocery market is projected to grow to USD 12 trillion from 2020 to 2027 with a 5 percent compound annual growth rate. 
  • In the USA, the most downloaded app is DoorDash. This grocery mobile app has more than 38 million users.
  • Experts have suggested that more than 60 percent of the users will prefer to buy groceries through their mobile phones instead of websites.

Monetization or business models for grocery apps:

Before you can begin with Grocery Delivery App Development, you need to choose a perfect business model to earn revenue. It is important to have a great revenue value to sustain for years in this competitive market. Some of the options that you can choose are: 

  • Aggregated

Well, this business model is very generic. Here, the vendors partner with local grocery stores. This model covers all the functionalities of a vendor to place in the platform and works perfectly as a chain model. Everything can be done within a single place. Under this model, you will function as a mediator between the owner and the shopper. The development of such apps will also cost less. 

By exploring the menu list, the users can add the required items to the cart. Once done, they can check out the products and complete the payment. Once the payment is made, the users will get a confirmation notification, and they can track the order in real-time. The delivery of the groceries will be managed by the grocery store owner.

  • Dedicated

You can also prefer to go for a dedicated business model. Here you will control your services. Under this model, the sellers and vendors register on the platform, and they utilize your services to supply groceries to the customers. But you need to provide them with delivery executives. 

  • Single Store App

In this grocery app model, you will develop the app for your store, and you will be responsible for dealing with all the tasks, like maintaining the app, keeping the menu updated, collecting payments, delivering the items, and resolving customers’ queries, and more. 

  • Subscription

Here, the users will buy a membership to use the app for a fixed period to enjoy the benefits of some premium services, like faster and free delivery, extra discounts, and more. 

  • Commission

Well, this may be an old business model, but it works. In general, for every sale through the app, the sellers will get commissions. At the same time, a small percentage of money is charged to the buyers for purchasing the groceries through the app and the sellers who register their portals on your platform. 

No matter what business or app model you choose, the primary purpose of developing a grocery delivery mobile app will be to make the process easier and more comfortable for your users while offering them an amazing user experience.

Understanding the Cost of Grocery Delivery App Development:

Well, there are different factors that can affect the Grocery Delivery Mobile App Development Cost. Some of the common factors to consider here are: 

  • The complexity of the grocery delivery app.
  • App development team size
  • Number of app platforms 
  • Region of app development
  • Integration of third-party apps. 

The complexity of the grocery app will be greatly affected by the design and features that you want to integrate into the app. The cost will be higher if you go for complex features and designs. Then, you need to choose between the platforms, i.e., Android or iOS. If you want to develop an app that can run on both these platforms, the cost will be high. 

The Grocery Delivery Mobile App Development Cost per hour will also vary from one region to another. For example, developers from the USA may charge around USD 50 to USD 300 per hour. In the case of European developers, the cost can range between USD 30 to USD 200, and Indian developers may charge USD 10 to USD 100 per hour.

Have a look at the below-given estimate for your grocery app as well, with simple Android coding and limited features. 

  • UI/UX design- USD 1500 to USD 3000
  • Technical documentation- USD 1000 to USD 2000
  • Front-end and back-end development cost- USD 10,000 to USD 20,000
  • QA and testing- USD 2000 to USD 4000

Going by this general quote, it can be said that the Grocery Delivery Mobile App Development Cost for creating a basic app for a single platform would be around USD 10,000 to USD 35,000. If you want to develop a cross-platform or hybrid app, then the cost can go up from USD 40,000 to USD 50,000. However, with a cross-platform grocery delivery app, you can perform much better in the market. 

Resources For Grocery Delivery App Development:

To make your app the best one, you need to find the best Grocery Delivery App Development Source. Well, you reach out to the app development company to get a perfect solution; the technological stack will play a crucial role. Some commonly used tools by the app development companies for grocery app development are: 

  • Real-time data analytics- Spart, Hadoop, IBM, BigData, Apple Flink, and more. 
  • Mobile platform- Android, iOS
  • Payment- PayPal, e-wallets, bank transfers, and more. 
  • Database- MongoDB, MailChimp Integration, Cassandra, Postgres, HBase, Voice, Cassandra
  • Phone, voice, and SMS Verification- Twilio or Nexmo. 
  • Cloud environments- Azure, Google and AWS 
  • Push notifications- Push.io and more. 

You can easily find an Affordable Grocery Delivery App Development Source, but it is important to make sure that the app has the best technologies to keep performing better and is scalable. 

Development Process of Grocery Delivery App:

As the Grocery Delivery App Development is a complex task, it needs to be processed with brainstorming, planning, and clear-cut approaches. So, the development model has the following crucial steps: 

  1. Strategy

The development company will discuss, research, brainstorm, and carry out market analysis to chart out a plan that will meet your business’s unique requirements. 

  1. Design and Prototyping

A prototype of the grocery app will be developed, and the features, UI/UX, and functionalities will be checked. If it looks good, the developers will begin working on the real app. 

  1. Development

The app will be developed based on the industry’s best practices so that your app can offer a smooth user experience. 

  1. QA and Testing

Your development company will carry out rigorous QA & testing to ensure that all features and functionalities are working properly. 

  1. Deployment

Once done with testing, the app will be deployed and listed on the app stores. Your app developer will also keep monitoring the app and optimize that whenever required. 

Just make sure you have chosen the right Grocery Delivery App Development Source to enjoy the best results. 

Understanding the Team Structure:

Having the best team on board is the crucial aspect of Grocery Delivery App Development. When you work with a proficient team, you can ensure the success of the app. So, it is advisable to work with a top-rated grocery app development firm. While choosing one, make sure that the team has experienced and skilled personnel, like:  

  • Project Manager- A person with complete knowledge and skills about the solution, and he/she should have managerial skills.
  • App Developers- The team may include Android app developers, iOS app developers, and front-end or back-end app developers. You can choose one based on your requirements. 
  • Designer- They will be responsible for the feel and look of your app. They can be graphic designers or UX/UI designers. 
  • QA Experts or Testers- QA experts, make sure that the app is set to work smoothly and that there are no errors or bugs. 

Final Words

Entering the grocery delivery industry with an app may sound like a great idea, but if you don’t add something unique to it, the major players in the industry will make the competition very tough. So, for Grocery Delivery App Development, always partner with the right app development company. While enjoying the best app, you will also be able to keep the Grocery Delivery Mobile App Development Cost low.
